text: (mese tibiyadi ovun niraye adhipatita) “o malik! obage deviyan apage karanava avasan kara damatva! (maranaya magin ho apata nidahasa læbunaden!)” yayi sabda nagannaha. eyata ohu “(nohæka), niyata vasayenma oba (me tatvayatama danduvama vindiminma nomæri) sthirava sitiya yutuya” yayi pavasanu æta
